version_description:
This update brings you some long-awaited visual improvements:

- Marvel at the new visuals and special effects.
- Enjoy an improved battle strategy.

This is the biggest battle release in Dragon City!

- Compete against other Dragon Masters in exciting PvP combats and climb the ranks to become the Ultimate Dragon Master!
- Play through all new unique arenas full of rewards and surprises.
- Collect lots of new and exclusive dragons that will only be obtainable in PvP.
- Check out your progress in Dragon City’s brand new leaderboards!
- Marvel at the new visuals and special effects.
- Enjoy an improved battle strategy.

There's a new major event coming in Dragon City: The Relic of Life! Enjoy this exciting storyline and meet 7 new dragons that you will be able to obtain!

- Collect artifacts in different parts of the game to summon the Rarity Dragons
- Use the Rarity Dragons to obtain the Origin Dragon, one of the best dragons ever released in the game!
- At the end of the event, you will have a chance to meet the one who started it all at the Tower Island: the Burglar Dragon!

Celebrate the Holidays in Dragon City!

- Don’t miss the end of The Relic Of Life event: Get all the Rarity Dragons to claim the Origin Dragon!
- The Xmas Event brings you dozens of special dragons!
- The Twin Dragons event is back with a new pair of exclusive dragons up for grabs.
- The Illusion Island has new limited-time paths that will take you to an exclusive dragon.
- Get the Burglar Dragon on an all-new Tower Island!
- Stay tuned for all the Xmas surprises in Dragon City.

Happy Holidays!

Update Dragon City to enjoy cool new features and events! Here’s what should look out for:
- The next Heroic Race brings you a new Heroic Dragon and special rewards every two laps!
- The Fire & Ice event will give you the chance to collect decorations and summon a powerful dragon!
- This version includes lots of important technical improvements.
Enjoy!

This is one of the biggest updates ever in Dragon City!
- Collect Orbs and take them to the Tree Of Life that has sprouted in Dragon City to summon exclusive dragons!
- Some of the dragons obtained in the Arenas and the Tree Of Life have unique new skills, such as healing, extra damage, etc. Discover them!
- There’s a new reward in the Arenas! As you defeat dragons PvP, you’ll receive a Warrior’s Chest, containing precious Orbs and more rewards for the best Dragon City Warriors!

This is one of the biggest updates ever in Dragon City!
- Collect Orbs and take them to the Tree Of Life that has sprouted in Dragon City to summon exclusive dragons!
- Some of the dragons obtained in the Arenas and the Tree Of Life have unique new skills, such as healing, extra damage, etc. Discover them!
- There’s a new reward in the Arenas! As you defeat dragons PvP, you’ll receive a Warrior’s Chest, containing precious Orbs and more rewards for the best Dragon City Warriors!

Dragon City’s first social update: Play with other Dragon Masters!

- Join Alliances to chat and cooperate with other players!
- There’s a new element in the game: Primal! Come and discover their behavior in battle and be amazed by their look, a cool mix of dinosaurs, magic, and technology.
- Start opening Alliance Chests! By joining forces with the Dragons Masters in your Alliance to complete tasks, you'll be able to reach milestones and open Alliance Chests containing Primal Dragon Orbs!

- Start opening Alliance Chests! By joining forces with the Dragons Masters in your Alliance to complete tasks, you'll be able to reach milestones and open Alliance Chests containing Primal Dragon Orbs!

- Start opening Alliance Chests! By joining forces with the Dragons Masters in your Alliance to complete tasks, you'll be able to reach milestones and open Alliance Chests containing Primal Dragon Orbs!

- Start opening Alliance Chests! By joining forces with the Dragons Masters in your Alliance to complete tasks, you'll be able to reach milestones and open Alliance Chests containing Primal Dragon Orbs!

Can Dragon City get even better? Yes, it can!
- Now you have the possibility of getting Habitat Tokens in the Arenas, some events, and other places in the game! Use these tokens to expand the capacity of your habitats and fit more dragons in your map.
- Are you already a master in battles? Now you have the option of playing in auto-battle mode. Just sit back and watch your dragons go!
- This version also includes some polishing and technical improvements.

- This version also includes some polishing and technical improvements.

- Now you have the possibility of getting Habitat Tokens in the Arenas, some events, and other places in the game! Use these tokens to expand the capacity of your habitats and fit more dragons in your map.
- Are you already a master in battles? Now you have the option of playing in auto-battle mode. Just sit back and watch your dragons go!

- This version also includes some polishing and technical improvements.

Get ready, Dragon Master! This update includes some major features you can't miss!

- Use Orbs to Empower your dragons! They will get a boost in their strength and unlock exclusive collections.
- Duplicate dragons give you rewards! Take your duplicates to the Tree Of Life and Recall them to obtain Orbs in exchange.
- The Dragon Roost replaces the Temples, making it easier than ever for you to level up many dragons!
- Enjoy a smoother experience with the improvements in this version!

Get ready, Dragon Master! This update includes some major features you can't miss!
- Use Orbs to Empower your dragons! They will get a boost in their strength and unlock exclusive collections.
- Duplicate dragons give you rewards! Take your duplicates to the Tree Of Life and Recall them to obtain Orbs in exchange.
- The Dragon Roost replaces the Temples, making it easier than ever for you to level up many dragons!
- Enjoy a smoother experience with the improvements in this version!

Get ready, Dragon Master! This update includes some major features you can't miss!
- Use Orbs to Empower your dragons! They will get a boost in their strength and unlock exclusive collections.
- Duplicate dragons give you rewards! Take your duplicates to the Tree Of Life and Recall them to obtain Orbs in exchange.
- The Dragon Roost replaces the Temples, making it easier than ever for you to level up many dragons!
- Enjoy a smoother experience with the improvements in this version!

There’s a new type of event! Get this update if you want to enjoy it to the fullest.

- Discover the Alliance Races: This is a brand new type of event island where you and all the Dragon Masters in your Alliance can join forces and collaborate to get a Heroic Dragon.
- Heroic Primal Dragons are here: Get the first Heroic Primal Dragon. It will be available exclusively in the Alliance Race!
- Enjoy a smoother experience with the improvements and fixes in this version!

There’s a new type of event! Get this update if you want to enjoy it to the fullest.
- Discover the Alliance Races: This is a brand new type of event island where you and all the Dragon Masters in your Alliance can join forces and collaborate to get a Heroic Dragon.
- Heroic Primal Dragons are here: Get the first Heroic Primal Dragon. It will be available exclusively in the Alliance Race!
- Enjoy a smoother experience with the improvements and fixes in this version!

Need more space for your dragons? You’re in luck!

- There’s now even more space on your islands to place habitats and buildings.

- Dragon City is even more beautiful with the cool new art style!

Need more space for your dragons? You’re in luck!

- There’s now even more space on your islands to place habitats and buildings.

- Dragon City is even more beautiful with the cool new art style!

More room in Dragon City!

- Your dragons are going to love all the extra space in the new Wonder Island. Unlock it and get special chests and amazing rewards.

- This version also includes technical improvements and polishing to keep everything running smoothly.

- The new search feature in your storage allows you to find exactly what you’re looking for.
- Your dragons will be jumping for joy because we’ve done a little polishing to make sure everything is working in the best possible way!

Now’s your chance to make your Dragons stronger than ever!

- The Tree of Life has even more surprises! Check out the new Orbs Shop to get Orbs to Empower your dragons!

- We’ve also done some polishing and made technical improvements which is always a plus!
Your dragons will be jumping for joy because we’ve done a little polishing to make sure everything is working in the best possible way!

Are you ready for an exciting, new challenge?!
- Fun is guaranteed on the new puzzle island! Play puzzles and win to get exclusive dragons and free rewards!
- The way to a dragon’s heart is through its stomach. The new Greenhouse constantly generates food to keep your dragons healthy and happy!
- And if that’s not enough, we’ve also done some polishing for these exciting new features!
We’ve spruced up a bit. Technical and stability improvements have been made. Check out our forums to discover the upcoming new features we have in store.
We’ve spruced up a bit. Technical and stability improvements have been made. Check out our forums to discover the upcoming new features we have in store.

The elemental forces of Dragon City have arrived!
- Exclusive new VIP Titan Dragon Collection
- 100% Protection against the first attack!
- Food production
- New Rank Quests that boost ranking-up speed!
There are also quicker loading speeds for the beginner's tutorial.
Enjoy!

The elemental forces of Dragon City have arrived!
- Exclusive new VIP Titan Dragon Collection
- 100% Protection against the first attack!
- Food production
- New Rank Quests that boost ranking-up speed!
There are also quicker loading speeds for the beginner's tutorial.
Enjoy!

Dragon Masters, look out for these new version updates!

- Clearer offer displays so you know which deal best suits you!
- Cool new visuals to notify you when your Alliance is working hard and when your Alliance Chest is ready to be claimed.
- Now increase your dragons' Rank in Friends Challenge Battles!
- A brand new Survey Section means more free Gems in the Freebies Island.

Do you think that dragons win battles and then sit back and stare at their trophies? Oh no, when you're not looking, they are working their tails off to improve the game for you!

It's the same Dragon City, only better!

This time we're bringing you some polishing and a bunch of technical improvements.

Dragon Masters, look out for these new version updates!

- Clearer offer displays so you know which deal best suits you!
- Cool new visuals to notify you when your Alliance is working hard and when your Alliance Chest is ready to be claimed.
- Now increase your dragons' Rank in Friends Challenge Battles!
- A brand new Survey Section means more free Gems in the Freebies Island.

Dragon City now has lots of new, handy features that you've been asking for!
- New filters for a smoother search in the Dragon Book! As well as a new search bar and filters in the Breeding Cave so you can easily breed your favorite dragons!
- Cool new visuals will let you know when your buildings are ready for an upgrade or when your Habitats have reached their Gold production limit. Collect and keep going!
- Skip the intro animation for Dragon Rescues if you just can't wait to fight!
Enjoy!

Dragon City just keeps getting better!

- Now you can see which of your dragons have been ranked up after battle.

- Clearer Quest visuals so you can see which dragons are needed for battle and which are busy.

- Polished Dragon Rescue play-through for smoother rescue missions!

- Improved dragon placement to help you decide where to put your new dragons!

Enjoy!

Looking for Orbs? Now you can trade them!

- Check out the new Trading Hub in the Tree of Life where you can trade Dragon Orbs with your Alliance teammates by using Trade Essences. You can find Trade Essences in the Heroic Race, Chests, and Islands.

- Make sure that you have joined an active Alliance so you can start trading now!

- We’ve done some polishing and made some improvements to keep your Dragon City looking as good as new!

Ready to share with your Alliance members?
- Introducing the new Alliance Gift Event! You and your Alliance members will get extra rewards when purchasing a Gems Pack! A win-win for everyone! Make sure you have the latest version and have joined an active Alliance, so you can share with your teammates!
- Win more battles with the help of the new battle search bar. Search and select the perfect dragon team to crush every battle!
- We’ve polished up your islands to keep Dragon City nice and shiny!

Dragons need your help!

- A big boss has captured some dragons. Fight in epic 6v6 battles and progress down the paths to save the dragons and win amazing rewards in the new Dragon Rescue.

- We’ve also done some polishing because your dragons deserve the very best!

Looking for Orbs? Now you can trade them!

- Check out the new Trading Hub in the Tree of Life where you can trade Dragon Orbs with your Alliance teammates by using Trade Essences. You can find Trade Essences in the Heroic Race, Chests, and Islands.

- Make sure that you have joined an active Alliance so you can start trading now!

- We’ve done some polishing and made some improvements to keep your Dragon City looking as good as new!

It’s time to come together!

- Dragon City’s first Global Challenge is here! Contribute and participate in this collaborative event to win exclusive rewards.

- We’ve made improvements to the Alliance Race! You can now see how well your Alliance members are doing in the race and chest contributions, plus lap rewards!

- Make sure to update the game so you don’t miss these exciting features!

- We’ve also done some polishing to make sure everything is as good as new.
We’ve spruced up a bit. Technical and stability improvements have been made. Check out our forums to discover the upcoming new features we have in store.

Teamwork makes the dream work!
- Need help finding the perfect Alliance? Now you can search for, find, and join the most active Alliances with the new Alliance Activity Indicator.
- Once you’ve found your dream Alliance, work together to reach the top of the new Global Alliance Ranking!
- Find your dragons faster with the new search bar in the Training Center!
- We’ve also done some polishing for these exciting new features!

It’s time to come together!

- Dragon City’s first Global Challenge is here! Contribute and participate in this collaborative event to win exclusive rewards.

- We’ve made improvements to the Alliance Race! You can now see how well your Alliance members are doing in the race and chest contributions, plus lap rewards!

- Make sure to update the game so you don’t miss these exciting features!

- We’ve also done some polishing to make sure everything is as good as new.

Love is in the air in Dragon City!
- With the new Breeding Event Island, you can check out all the new, exclusive breeding combinations that are available for a limited time only!
- You asked and we delivered: There’s even more extra space for your dragons and habitats with the new Marvel Island. Unlock it and get special chests and amazing rewards.
- We’ve also done some polishing to keep everything as stunning as the new features!

Love is in the air in Dragon City!
- With the new Breeding Event Island, you can check out all the new, exclusive breeding combinations that are available for a limited time only!
- You asked and we delivered: There’s even more extra space for your dragons and habitats with the new Marvel Island. Unlock it and get special chests and amazing rewards.
- We’ve also done some polishing to keep everything as stunning as the new features!

Dragon City just keeps getting better!
- Because you can never have too many Dragon Master Points, we’ve added two new ways to maximize your DMP’s: Empowering and increasing your collection with new and unique dragons.
- If that’s not enough, this version also includes some polishing to keep your dragons nice and happy!

Dragon City just keeps getting better!
- Because you can never have too many Dragon Master Points, we’ve added two new ways to maximize your DMP’s: Empowering and increasing your collection with new and unique dragons.
- If that’s not enough, this version also includes some polishing to keep your dragons nice and happy!

Make your dragons stand out from the crowd!
- Introducing the new Dragon Skins! Check out the special Christmas Skins and dress your dragons up in holiday style. Be on the lookout because more Skins will be coming soon!
- Want to Empower or Summon a dragon, but you’re just shy of a few Orbs? Have no fear, the new Joker Orbs are here! Check them out today!
- We’ve also done some polishing to get your dragons in the holiday spirit!

- We’ve also done some polishing to get your dragons in the holiday spirit!

Dragons need your help!

- We’ve also done some polishing because your dragons deserve the very best!

- We’ve also done some polishing because your dragons deserve the very best!

Check the ranks and show them what you’re made of!

- Calling all collectors! The competition is on! The new Unique Dragon Ranking lets you see how your dragon collection ranks compared to other players.

- Are you a busy bee? We got you. Save time with the improvements in the Ancient World Crafting. Now you can craft in just one click!

- We’ve done some polishing to keep your Dragon City glowing.

-Battles can leave Dragon City a bit disorderly, but we’ve got it covered. This update includes some polishing to keep everything tidy and running smoothly.

Do you want to get a reward every day just for coming to check on your dragons? Then go ahead and update!

- There's a new calendar with daily rewards you'll obtain just for entering the game! Check in every day to keep your streak and see how your daily rewards get better and better.

- Enjoy a smoother experience: We've done some polishing to keep Dragon City as good as new!

Do you think that dragons win battles and then sit back and stare at their trophies? Oh no, when you're not looking, they are working their tails off to improve the game for you!

It's the same Dragon City, only better!

This time we're bringing you some polishing and a bunch of technical improvements.

How far will you fly?
- Enjoy the new Runner Island in Dragon City!
- Soar the skies and earn exclusive rewards with Nimbus, your dragon racer!
- Switch lanes, dodge the rocks, and collect as many Pinwheels as possible!
- More Pinwheels mean more rewards. Will you get the first Legendary Wind dragon?
- Global chat has also been disabled for underage users.
And if that’s not enough, we’ve also done some polishing to make sure everything is as good as new.

The elemental forces of Dragon City have arrived!
- Exclusive new VIP Titan Dragon Collection
- 100% Protection against the first attack!
- Food production
- New Rank Quests that boost ranking-up speed!
There are also quicker loading speeds for the beginner's tutorial.
Enjoy!

Dragon TV is now live!
- The Freebies Island has had a makeover, there are now even better rewards up for grabs.
- Tune in regularly to earn yourself exclusive Chests with guaranteed prizes!
- Spin the Dragon TV roulette and try your luck at getting some top rewards.
- We've also polished up your Islands to keep Dragon City nice and shiny!
Keep watching, keep winning!

Dragon TV is now live!
- The Freebies Island has had a makeover, there are now even better rewards up for grabs.
- Tune in regularly to earn yourself exclusive Chests with guaranteed prizes!
- Spin the Dragon TV roulette and try your luck at getting some top rewards.
- We've also polished up your Islands to keep Dragon City nice and shiny!
Keep watching, keep winning!
-Battles can leave Dragon City a bit disorderly, but we've got it covered. This update includes some polishing to keep everything tidy and running smoothly.

Part of an Alliance?
- Your dragons deserve the best, so why not treat them to some new superfoods?! New Alliance crops are now available in your Farms!
- If you haven't already, join an Alliance and reap the rewards! Higher food production means stronger dragons!
Your Dragon TV has also been retuned, as well as some other bug fixes.

The power is in your hands!
- Try out this brand new Beta release of the Missing Dragon Rescue.
- Select the dragon you want to rescue to complete collections or Empower your favorites!
- Dragon Rescue Keys will also stay with you from one rescue to another.
- Lots of Common dragons await! More rarities coming soon.
Dragon Book bug fixes also mean your Empowerment stars are back.

The power is in your hands!
- Try out this brand new first release of the Missing Dragon Rescue.
- Select the dragon you want to rescue to complete collections or Empower your favorites!
- Dragon Rescue Keys will also stay with you from one rescue to another.
- Lots of Common dragons await! More rarities coming soon.
Dragon Book bug fixes also mean your Empowerment stars are back.

Missing Dragon Rescue Improvements
- Got tons of dragons ready to fight? Now dragon selection is even easier!
- Instantly choose between your best and worst teams.
- Select your next team of 6 with just one tap.
Plus new Key Kits in this feature's Key Shop!

Missing Dragon Rescue Improvements
- Got tons of dragons ready to fight? Now dragon selection is even easier!
- Instantly choose between your best and worst teams.
- Select your next team of 6 with just one tap.
Plus new Key Kits in this feature's Key Shop!

Polishing and improvements for the Missing Dragon Rescue, including:
- You now have the option of skipping dragon cooldowns so they can jump straight back into battle!
- Updated selection list so you can choose the dragons you need most.
- Quantity of rewards will now be displayed on each node.
Happy rescuing!

Polishing and improvements for the Missing Dragon Rescue, including:
- You now have the option of skipping dragon cooldowns so they can jump straight back into battle!
- Updated selection list so you can choose the dragons you need most.
- Quantity of rewards will now be displayed on each node.
Happy rescuing!

Work together and win big!
- The Alliance building has had a makeover... Time to explore!
- New Alliance Chests means better rewards than ever before.
- Different dragons will continue to be rewarded, meaning you can Summon and even Empower them to the MAX!
- Cooperation is key if you want to reach the new final Chest!
Be sure to update to participate in the upcoming Alliance Week! How high will your Alliance rank?

Take your rescuing to the next level!
- Rare and Very Rare dragons are now available in the Missing Dragon Rescue!
- Common dragon paths are also shorter and full of new rewards.
- Looking at a specific dragon? Access the Rescue directly from its information pop-up!
- You'll also find more info on each Rescue, such as duration and difficulty.

This little piggy went to market and got you a great deal on Gems!
- Polishes and improvements for your Piggy Bank.
- Keep track of how full it is and how much further you have to go.
- Get notified when it is overflowing with tons of Gems!
- The best value for Gems in Dragon City.
Oink, Oink!

Empowering your dragons has just got even better!
- Discover increased stat boosts to make your dragons even stronger when Empowered!
- Find a new and improved dragon feed-screen with more information on Empower & Rank stats.
- Need some stronger attacks? Access the Training Center directly from your dragon feed-screen!
- Plus, plenty of technical improvements to keep your City working smoothly.

Empower Reborn
- Empowered dragons deserve to battle in style, right? Check out the mystical new aura that surrounds your Empowered beasts and watch it grow with each Empowerment!
- Is that all? Nope! Your Empowered dragons will also produce more Gold, so Empower to 5 Stars for maximum Gold production!

-Battles can leave Dragon City a bit disorderly, but we've got it covered. This update includes some polishing to keep everything tidy and running smoothly.
-Battles can leave Dragon City a bit disorderly, but we've got it covered. This update includes some polishing to keep everything tidy and running smoothly.

Collections made easy!
This new feature includes:
- Complete visibility on your collection progress all in one place: See how many Items you have collected and how many you still have to collect.
- Instantly receive your Reward: No more waiting around, grab your well-earned prize right there and then!
- Want to keep your exclusive Items to decorate your Island? No worries, Items will be left in Storage for you to place or sell.

Collections made easy!
This new feature includes:
- Complete visibility on your collection progress all in one place: See how many Items you have collected and how many you still have to collect.
- Instantly receive your Reward: No more waiting around, grab your well-earned prize right there and then!
- Want to keep your exclusive Items to decorate your Island? No worries, Items will be left in Storage for you to place or sell.

Breeding Reborn
- Use Empowered and high-rarity dragons during breeding to produce stronger offspring and unlock new breedable dragons!
- Read the helpful indicator when selecting parent dragons to see your boosted chances and new unlockable dragons.
- Enjoy improved navigation and beautifully animated backgrounds found in all breeding locations!
Empower, Breed, Master.

Discover your new home of Collections!
- Manage Collections all in one place with clear and easy navigation.
- See which Collections are completed and which are brand new!
- Know when you have a reward ready to claim and when a Collection is nearly over.
Keep conquering Collections, Dragon Master!

Breeding Reborn Updates
- No more need to rely on timers... Identify special eggs with cool new visuals that show you've got a powerful dragon cooking!
- Easily select dragon parents with an updated, smoother search tool!
- Further polishing and improvements based on your feedback.
Go breed some mighty dragons, Dragon Masters!

Sometimes unsure what is inside a Chest? Wonder no more!
- Simply tap on any Chest within all Maze, Tower, Grid, and Fog Islands...
- See the full list of exclusive rewards...
- And plan your route around the Island!
Enjoy this handy update, Dragon Masters!

Dragon Mastery
- Time to open up your dusty Dragon Book and check out its brand new feature: Dragon Mastery!
- Consider yourself a collector? Dragon Mastery gives you exclusive rewards for collecting dragons.
- This feature is currently in Beta so stay tuned for new updates and more exciting content coming your way!
Get collecting, Dragon Masters!

Get collecting, Dragon Masters!

Divine Dragon Pass
Ready to experience the power behind the Divine Pass?
- Complete daily & weekly goals to earn Divine Points and progress along the paths.
- Unlock the premium path using the Divine Pass and bask in the glory of tons of exclusive rewards!
- Meet a new family of VIP dragons! Discover their story, strength, and skills with the Divine Pass.
- Enhance your Dragon City experience and try out new strategies to reap maximum rewards!
It's time to get your Divine Dragon Pass!
